changelog: This update introduces new features to the Music App.
-Jump to a specific timestamp in any track – get to your favorite part instantly.
-Automatic playback of the next song as soon as the current one ends – seamless listening, non-stop.
-On the lock screen, you’ll now see the track's album cover, with the background adapting to match the artwork for a beautiful visual experience.
-On devices with Island, you can now control the track’s timestamp directly from the island – simple and intuitive.
